Patient 8: A 78-year-old female with a history of atrial fibrillation and osteoporosis. She is on warfarin for anticoagulation and takes alendronate for bone health. Her medication list also includes a calcium supplement and vitamin D. She has a history of falls, which has been a concern given her anticoagulation therapy. Her family history is notable for cardiovascular disease. She has no known drug allergies.
